verses.verse: It happened after<WH310> these things,<WH1697> that God<WH430> tested<WH5254> Abraham,<WH85> and said<WH559> to him,<WH85> "Abraham!" He said,<WH559> "Here I am."

He said,<WH559> "Now<WH3947> take your son,<WH1121> your only<WH3173> son,<WH1121> whom you love,<WH157> even Isaac,<WH3327> and go into the land<WH776> of Moriah.<WH4179> Offer him<WH5927> there for a burnt offering<WH5930> on one<WH259> of the mountains<WH2022> which I will tell you of.<WH559>"

Abraham<WH85> rose early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and saddled<WH2280> his donkey,<WH2543> and took<WH3947> two<WH8147> of his young men<WH5288> with him,<WH3327> and Isaac his son.<WH1121> He split<WH1234> the wood<WH6086> for the burnt offering,<WH5930> and rose up,<WH6965> and went<WH3212> to the place<WH4725> of which God<WH430> had told him.<WH559>
On the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> Abraham<WH85> lifted up<WH5375> his eyes,<WH5869> and saw<WH7200> the place<WH4725> far off.<WH7350>

Abraham<WH85> said<WH559> to his young men,<WH5288> "Stay<WH3427> here with the donkey.<WH2543> The boy<WH5288> and I will go<WH3212> yonder.<WH3541> We will worship,<WH7812> and come back to you.<WH7725>"

Abraham<WH85> took<WH3947> the wood<WH6086> of the burnt offering<WH5930> and laid<WH7760> it on Isaac<WH3327> his son.<WH1121> He took<WH3947> in his hand<WH3027> the fire<WH784> and the knife.<WH3979> They both<WH8147> went<WH3212> together.<WH3162>

Isaac<WH3327> spoke<WH559> to Abraham<WH85> his father,<WH1> and said,<WH559> "My father?<WH1>" He said,<WH559> "Here I am,<WH1121> my son." He said,<WH559> "Here is the fire<WH784> and the wood,<WH6086> but where is the lamb<WH7716> for a burnt offering?<WH5930>"
Abraham<WH85> said,<WH559> "God<WH430> will provide<WH7200> himself the lamb<WH7716> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> my son.<WH1121>" So they both<WH8147> went<WH3212> together.<WH3162>

They came<WH935> to the place<WH4725> which God<WH430> had told<WH559> him of.<WH85> Abraham built<WH1129> the altar<WH4196> there,<WH6186> and laid the wood<WH6086> in order,<WH6186> bound<WH6123> Isaac<WH3327> his son,<WH1121> and laid<WH7760> him on the altar,<WH4196> on<WH4605> the wood.<WH6086>
Abraham<WH85> stretched out<WH7971> his hand,<WH3027> and took<WH3947> the knife<WH3979> to kill<WH7819> his son.<WH1121>
The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> called<WH7121> to him out of the sky,<WH8064> and said,<WH559> "Abraham,<WH85> Abraham!<WH85>" He said,<WH559> "Here I am."

He said,<WH559> "Don't<WH7971> lay your hand<WH3027> on<WH413> the boy,<WH5288> neither do<WH6213> anything<WH3972> to him.<WH6258> For now I know<WH3045> that you fear<WH3373> God,<WH430> since you have not<WH3808> withheld<WH2820> your son,<WH3173> your only son,<WH1121> from me."

Abraham<WH85> lifted up<WH5375> his eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and saw that behind<WH310> him was a ram<WH352> caught<WH270> in the thicket<WH5442> by his horns.<WH7161> Abraham<WH85> went<WH3212> and took<WH3947> the ram,<WH352> and offered him up<WH5927> for a burnt offering<WH5930> instead<WH8478> of his son.<WH1121>

Abraham<WH85> called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of that place<WH4725> Yahweh<WH3070> Will Provide.<WH834> As it is said<WH559> to this day,<WH3117> "On Yahweh<WH3068>'s mountain,<WH2022> it will be provided.<WH7200>"
The angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> called<WH7121> to Abraham<WH85> a second time<WH8145> out of the sky,<WH8064>

and said,<WH559> "I have sworn<WH7650> by myself,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> because<WH3282> you have done<WH6213> this thing,<WH1697> and have not<WH3808> withheld<WH2820> your son,<WH1121> your only son,<WH3173>

that I will bless<WH1288> you greatly,<WH1288> and I will multiply<WH7235> your seed<WH2233> greatly<WH7235> like the stars<WH3556> of the heavens,<WH8064> and like the sand<WH2344> which is on the<WH3220> seashore.<WH8193> Your seed<WH2233> will possess<WH3423> the gate<WH8179> of his enemies.<WH341>
In your seed<WH2233> will all the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776> be blessed,<WH1288> because<WH834> you have obeyed<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963>"
So Abraham<WH85> returned<WH7725> to his young men,<WH5288> and they rose up<WH6965> and went<WH3212> together<WH3162> to Beersheba.<WH884> Abraham<WH85> lived at Beersheba.<WH3427>

It happened after<WH310> these things,<WH1697> that it was told<WH5046> Abraham,<WH85> saying,<WH559> "Behold,<WH4435> Milcah, she also has borne<WH3205> children<WH1121> to your brother<WH251> Nahor:<WH5152>
Uz<WH5780> his firstborn,<WH1060> Buz<WH938> his brother,<WH251> Kemuel<WH7055> the father<WH1> of Aram,<WH758>
Chesed,<WH3777> Hazo,<WH2375> Pildash,<WH6394> Jidlaph,<WH3044> and Bethuel.<WH1328>"
Bethuel<WH1328> became the father<WH3205> of Rebekah.<WH7259> These eight<WH8083> Milcah<WH4435> bore<WH3205> to Nahor,<WH5152> Abraham<WH85>'s brother.<WH251>
His concubine,<WH6370> whose name<WH8034> was Reumah,<WH7208> also bore<WH3205> Tebah,<WH2875> Gaham,<WH1514> Tahash,<WH8477> and Maacah.<WH4601>
